pr_title: [DROOLS-5462] Generating default model name for models missing it.

timeline.message: [DROOLS-5462] Generating default model name for models missing it.

timeline.bodyText: what about empty string instead of ANONYMOUS?
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: Do not use File.separator and use /: Kie virtual file system doesn't support OS specific separator so you always receive /. Or at least try both
timeline.author: danielezonca
